extendedInfo.description: With more than 1,490 worksheets, iTooch 3rd Grade Language Arts is a new and fun way of practicing and learning Language Arts for third graders. It is, by far, the largest collection of educational worksheets based on the US National Common Core Standards on Google Play for elementary school.Used by more than 1,000,000 users, iTooch apps are a full learning solution which helps parents, teachers and students to identify and address their learning needs in a fun and motivating way. â OUR APPLICATION CONTAINS â â 5 themes: Reading, Writing and Composition, Research and Reasoning, Vocabulary Booster, Communication. â 50 chapters per title with lessons, examples, and figures.â 1,490 questions per title with clues and detailed explanations â 62 original pictures â¡ iTooch 3rd Grade Language Arts is by far the most comprehensive educative tool on Google Play for students in Grade 3. â« PARENTS AND KIDS LOVE OUR APPS â« â£ "This app has been everything I was looking for. Multiple question types including decimal points and word problems. The ability to test the learning. And here's the kicker: it is so much fun, I had to pull my son off of it after 2 hours!" â£ "My son is home schooled plus goes to a charter school. This program makes it easy to supplement his schoolwork without buying a lot of books or printing worksheets. I recommend it for all parents who are committed to their children's education." â WHAT TEACHERS HAVE SAID â â£ "I just downloaded your apps. Wow. They are amazing. I have been using the tablet for over a year in my class and I have to say that this is one if the best apps I have seen in a long time."â£ "A terrific app that covers a lot of ground concept-wise. This app combines a no-frills approach to content while still providing the user with an exciting learning experience. The mascot is adorable and keeps kids on task with lots of encouragement and there is a lesson summary available when needed." â UNIQUE SET OF FEATURES â â£ An embedded calculator to make complex calculations â£ A virtual blackboard that enables players to draw drafts and figures â£ A lesson summary attached to each chapter â£ In-app feedback to send suggestion to the author of the content straight into the appâ£ Automatic updates in the background to load new activitiesâ CONTACT â â£ Facebook: http://facebook.com/itoochapps â£ Twitter: @itooch â£ Website: http://edupad.com

reviews.title: Good study tool
reviews.comment: This app is good for reinforcing already learned topics but would be great if there were more in the lesson that taught rather than refresh. Currently the app seems more of a study tool than a learning tool. Also needs some way for slow readers to be able to complete the required reading in the time allotted.
reviews.author: Kim Fienberg

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.comment: My kids loved iTooch and can\'t stop playing!
reviews.author: Amandine Royer

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: My kid loved during our vacation.
